name: Clean Block - Puzzle Game
description:
Clean Block - Most popular & classic block puzzle game! A simple but challenging jewel blast block puzzle game!!!

Easy to Play but Hard to Master!!
Once you start, you will never stop!

Easy To Play
- Clear all the blocks to make jewel blast!
- The jewel block can not be rotated.
- Drag the blocks to any place you want in the grid.
- Fill the line and clear the jewel block and make jewel blast.
- Game would be over when there is no any space for stones.

Why Clean Block is better:
- Totally Free jewel blast block puzzle game.
- Fun jewel block puzzle game is suitable for all ages.
- No time limit. Play fun block puzzle game anywhere and anytime!
- New class block puzzle game! See how jewel blast!
- Beautiful jewel block and fantastic jewel blast!
- Mysterious Universal Graphic. Look at the blocks and jewel blast!

Get ready for an incredible puzzle game adventure in Clean Block NOW!
